abstract: Stock market rallies, ending weeklong slump.
lead_paragraph: Potential advances in negotiations over Greece’s debts prompted all 30 stocks in the Dow Jones industrial average to end in the green on Wednesday.

headline.main: After Days of Losses, the Market Turns Around
headline.print_headline: After Days of Losses, the Market Turns Around

snippet: Potential advances in negotiations over Greece’s debts prompted all 30 stocks in the Dow Jones industrial average to end in the green on Wednesday.
